2.3.1.19. lex_DumpLexemes()

[<<<] [>>>]

Us this function for debugging. This function dumps the list of lexemes to the file psDump. 

void lex_DumpLexemes(pLexObject pLex,
                     FILE *psDump
  )@{
[<<<] [>>>]
